directions: In a 3-to-4 quart slow cooker, mix potatoes, onion, celery, broth and water. Cover, cook on low heat for 6-8 hours. In a small bowl, whisk together milk and flour, add to potato mixture. Turn slow cooker to high for an additional 20-30 minutes. Garnish with cheese, bacon, sour cream and green onion.
ingredients: 1 bag (32 oz) Southern-style hash brown potatoes; thawed
title: Potato Soup
